member.name: M:DG.Tweening.Core.ABSAnimationComponent.DORestart(System.Boolean)
member.param: If TRUE, re-evaluates the tween's start and end values from its current position. Set it to TRUE when spawning the same DOTweenPath in different positions (like when using a pooling system)

member.name: T:DG.Tweening.DOTweenPath
member.summary: Attach this to a GameObject to create and assign a path to it

member.name: M:DG.Tweening.DOTweenPath.DORestart(System.Boolean)
member.param: If TRUE, re-evaluates the tween's start and end values from its current position. Set it to TRUE when spawning the same DOTweenPath in different positions (like when using a pooling system)

member.name: M:DG.Tweening.DOTweenPath.GetDrawPoints
member.summary: Returns a list of points that are used to draw the path inside the editor.

member.name: T:DG.Tweening.Plugins.SpiralPlugin
member.summary: Tweens a Vector3 along a spiral. EndValue represents the direction of the spiral

member.name: T:DG.Tweening.ShortcutExtensionsPro
member.summary: Methods that extend known Unity objects and allow to directly create and control tweens from their instances

member.name: M:DG.Tweening.ShortcutExtensionsPro.DOSpiral(UnityEngine.Transform,System.Single,System.Nullable{UnityEngine.Vector3},DG.Tweening.SpiralMode,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Tweens a Transform's localPosition in a spiral shape. Also stores the transform as the tween's target so it can be used for filtered operations
member.param: The axis around which the spiral will rotate
Frequency of the rotation. Lower values lead to wider spirals
Indicates how much the tween should move along the spiral's axis
If TRUE the tween will smoothly snap all values to integers

member.name: M:DG.Tweening.ShortcutExtensionsPro.DOSpiral(UnityEngine.Rigidbody,System.Single,System.Nullable{UnityEngine.Vector3},DG.Tweening.SpiralMode,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Tweens a Rigidbody's position in a spiral shape. Also stores the transform as the tween's target so it can be used for filtered operations
member.param: The axis around which the spiral will rotate
Frequency of the rotation. Lower values lead to wider spirals
Indicates how much the tween should move along the spiral's axis
If TRUE the tween will smoothly snap all values to integers

member.name: F:DG.Tweening.SpiralMode.Expand
member.summary: The spiral motion will expand outwards for the whole the tween

member.name: F:DG.Tweening.SpiralMode.ExpandThenContract
member.summary: The spiral motion will expand outwards for half the tween and then will spiral back to the starting position
